meta.title: Smart Guide for Data Legislation Compliance
meta.description: An intelligent platform that helps you understand and implement national data management standards, with self-assessment tools and accurate answers grounded in official documents.
meta.keywords: Smart Guide, data legislation, NDMO, data governance, compliance, AI

chat.heading: Smart Guide for Data Legislation Compliance
chat.subheading: Ask questions about data legislation — answers are grounded only in official documents.
chat.placeholder: Ask a question about data legislation and standards...
chat.notFound: Not found in the provided documents.
chat.noSources: No sources available. Please enable at least one file from the Files tab in the admin panel.
chat.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
chat.errorRateLimit: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
chat.errorDailyLimit: You've reached the daily limit (20 questions). Please come back tomorrow.
chat.errorBlocked: I can only assist with questions about data governance legislation and standards. Please rephrase your question.
chat.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Ask me any question about data legislation and standards and I will answer based only on the official documents with source citations.
suggestions: What are the main data governance controls?
What is the data classification policy?
How should data be shared between entities?
What are the open data policy requirements?
What roles are needed for data governance?

dashboard.title: Data Governance Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Visual overview of data governance policies, controls, and specifications

assessment.title: Compliance Self-Assessment
assessment.subtitle: Evaluate your organization's compliance with data governance controls
assessment.highCompliance: Good compliance level. Continue monitoring and improving.
assessment.mediumCompliance: Moderate compliance. Focus on partially implemented controls.
assessment.lowCompliance: Low compliance. Immediate action required on data governance controls.

gapAnalysis.title: Gap Analysis
gapAnalysis.subtitle: Identify compliance gaps against data governance requirements and get recommendations
